title: Didn't receive mastery token
body: Hi, I lost a hexakill game but received an S- rank. However I didn't get a mastery token. Is the requirement S and higher, or do I have to win the match? Cheers.

replies.body: i've got fizz lvl 5, after that i won 3 games with at least a S- rateing. didnt get a token from one of these games. is this bugged?

Hey there,

Featured gammeodes do not award mastery tokens afaik.

I just started a new topic, I should of check here first. I just got an S on Fizz yet no token! Is this a current glitch? As i received one yesterday but not today. If its a bug, do they get credited later on? Or bad luck earn one again?

I also didn't received mastery token although I won the match (hexakill) with {{champion:112}} and got S- .
I only need one more token to craft mastery 6 and it seems it's really hard to get S- with this champion. :(
Likewise. Just smashed out 2 hexakill matches with {{champion:86}}  and got S- in both, fully keen to up him to mastery 6, but got nothing. :C
I have won and received and S- or above on two occasions now and still received nothing. I think its still not working 100%
